title: positive thread only positive people allowed
body:
hey everyone glad you could make it. today we will be having a very positive and uplifting thread where we talk about our favorite things and why they are your favorite

please answer one or more of the following questions in detail or come up with your own favorite thing to talk about. 

1. favorite champ
2. favorite thing about league
3. favorite activity
4. favorite food
5. favorite role
6. favorite book, movie or tv show

for me it's the mcchicken.

NO NEGATIVITY ALLOWED. any negative posters will be politely asked to leave. thank you. remember to wash your hands after using the bathroom and don't drink and drive
